node._content: [LABEL Main final! You shaked up that gop on money right now!][BGNDVIDEO Titles][MUSIC none]
[LABEL Hey, hey, brotha, stop! Take one hundred and... be quiet!][VIDEO GopGives100rub][AUDIO {this.lang}/take_100_and_keep_silent]
[LABEL Well, as you wish, Checkryzh will take more from you for that...]
[LABEL ][FINAL Negative final. Gop has chived you by knife. Don't be so risky in real life!][VIDEO GopThrustKnife][AUDIO knife_blow]

[LABEL I'll chive you by knife right away, you'll be spatting by blood, nit!][VIDEO GopTreatenWithKnife][AUDIO {this.lang}/cut_you][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL And what will you do with me?]

[LABEL Who the hell do you think you are?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/vetosh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Ok give me a hundred and I won't tell him.]
[LABEL ][FINAL Neutral final. Gop has lost his interest to you and gone away. You lucky guy...][VIDEO GopLostInterest]
[LABEL Ok, ok, I just joked for a while!]

[LABEL You haven't sucked in? Just be quiet and that's it!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/simply_no_talking][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL I haven't to tell him, how you called him 'big sucka'?]
[LABEL What nothing not to tell him?]

[LABEL Ok then, go where you went! Tell nothing to Checkryzh.][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/Nothing_say_Chekryzh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Yes, we studied in the same school class.]
[LABEL ][FINAL Negative final. Gop hit you to your pumpkin head.][VIDEO GopPunchesToFace][AUDIO {this.lang}/Take_it_fool][SOUNDFX boom2]

[LABEL You have steamed me out already! To nobody I called! Row off from here until I've beaten all the shit out of you!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/no_phone_to_Chekryzh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Did he tell he know me?]

[LABEL Disappear from here right now I say!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/hide_away][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Listen, you -- row off from here!][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/go_away][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Hey, let me talk to him!]

[LABEL "Hey yo, Checkryzh, how're you doing, bro? Here is one stupid dude is talking he might be knowing you! He's looking like a big sucka..."][VIDEO GopPhonesChekryzh][AUDIO {this.lang}/Hallo_Chekryzh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL ][FINAL Positive final! You took gop's attention off and hit him into his pumpkin head!][VIDEO GopBePunched][SOUNDFX boom]

[LABEL But what's in your pocket?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/what_in_packet][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Have no phone, left it at home.]
[LABEL Okay, take it. But please call quickly!][VIDEO GopTakesMobile]
[LABEL ][FINAL Positive final! You've eluded of the vigilance of that gop.][VIDEO GopLooksAside][AUDIO {this.lang}/Where_is_shit]
[LABEL Okay, take it. But first clean up a shit.]

[LABEL Don't piss up in front of me, dial 8... 9... uhhh... forgot! Anyway, give it to me I'll dial by myself.][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/give_me_i_phone_myself][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Okay, but make a call from my hands!]

[LABEL Give me, I'll use my sim card.][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/give_mobila_my_SIM][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL A zero balance on my phone...]

[LABEL Give me your phone with camera to make a call.][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/give_me_mobila][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL I gave you one hundred, I have to go!]

[LABEL Where do you think you're go? Stay here!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/where_are_you_stop][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Ok, take one hundred! Sorry, I have to go...][VIDEO GopTakes2x50rub]

[LABEL Hey you sucka, no more talk! Give me all your money right now!][VIDEO GopTreatenWithKnife][AUDIO {this.lang}/money_give_to_me_faster][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL I meant he knows me visually...]

[LABEL And why do you muddy the waters that you know him? Pay up one hundred for your rotten talking!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/lie_you_know_Chekryzh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL The truth is he seen me but we never talked.]

[LABEL I'll call him to check right now! You'll be owing me money if you lie...][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/phone_check][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Checkryzh? That big sucka? Hehehy! And does he know you?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/Chekryzh_knows_you][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL ][FINAL Negative final! For gops the name 'Vasya' means sucka!][VIDEO GopPunchesToFace][AUDIO {this.lang}/Take_it_fool][SOUNDFX boom2]

[LABEL Which of the tough guys do you know?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/whom_knew][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Are you a Red Ridinghood? Carry pies to grandma? Hehehy!... Let you treat each of us with a cigarette.][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/carry_patties][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL And you neither here nor there?]

[LABEL And what are you sniffing out here?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/what_you_do_here][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Hey, from what town district are you from?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/what_region][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Well, I visit a gym keeping my body in a good shape.]
[LABEL ][FINAL Positive final! This gop ran away from you feeling a terror!][VIDEO GopIsFrightened][AUDIO {this.lang}/No_no_no]
[LABEL Oh! Here he is! "Hey, Dan, this guy wants to meet with you!"]

[LABEL And what do you think you've scared me shitless by him? Row off from here!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/do_you_scare_me][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL My friend is a professional boxer.]

[LABEL Hey, are you some sort of a sportsman? No, I don't think so.][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/are_you_sportsmen][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL No I haven't. I'm also looking for a cigarette whole morning today.]

[LABEL Have you a cigarette for each of us?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/have_smoking][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Here is another nickel in the other pocket. Look!]
[LABEL You putting me on?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/are_you_jeer_me][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL No need. A nickel is enough?][VIDEO GopTakes5rub]

[LABEL Don't give me that crap! What if I search?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/if_i_search_money][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL What, Tramps? Any real man always has 3 hundreds on a pocket. Oh, you know what -- I can open you a credit line. How much have you with you now?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/credit_offer][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL They don't have money as well.]
[LABEL ][FINAL Positive final! Your friend have beaten this gop!]
[LABEL And you will have to divide money with him?]
[LABEL A student. Parents sent money him yesterday.]

[LABEL Who's your friend? What's he in real life?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/what_kind_of_friend][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Are you afraid to go alone?]

[LABEL Okay. I'll ask my homie to go with us.][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/call_koresh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL ][FINAL Neutral final. Seems you've got rid of that gop this time...][VIDEO GopGoneLoop]

[LABEL Hey, go by yourself and bring it here. Listen, if you don't come back to me, I'll find you and beat.][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/go_and_take_money_yourself][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Well... ok let's go to my friend, he'll give.]

[LABEL You go and borrow money from your homies.][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/ask_friends_for_money][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Just I have no money for that.]

[LABEL You don't believe me? That's a real great deal, yopta!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/offer_rich_buisnes][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL No, thanks, offer your deal to somebody else.]
[LABEL ][FINAL Negative final. Gop's homie hit you to your pumpking head.]

[LABEL Not a problem, come and meet with him.][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/go_and_talk_to_koresh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL I even don't know your homie...]

[LABEL Any real man will take! My homie will take, just he has no money for now. But later he will take it for 5 hundreds, be sure!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/any_pacan_buy_perst][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Ok then buy a seal ring for 3 hundreds, my older brotha grabbed it from the prison. In really, it costs 5 hundreds but I just need fast money, so making a discount for you...][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/buy_brothers_perst][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL You haven't smoked in? He hasn't drunk for 7 years in the prison but you gave me only one nickel?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/brother_was_prisoner_no_drinking][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL My older brotha is back from the prison today, wanna drink, drop some money for the real man?][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/give_money_to_drink][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Hey, listen, here's one deal offer for you...][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/I_have_a_deal_for_you][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Just I don't like once someone distracting me.]

[LABEL Hey... why are you so rude?][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/Why_are_you_so_rude][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL What do you want from me?]

[LABEL Hey, don't be insolent to me!][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/why_are_you_impudent][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Is it beneath for you to listen a real man?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/are_you_har_to_hear_normal_boy][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Don't hurry up, here's one deal offer for you...][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/dont_hurry_i_have_a_deal_for_you][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Hey, brotha, wait!][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/Hey_brother_stop][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][AMBIENT AmbientStreet][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face_en][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Главный финал! Ты только что протряс гопа!][BGNDVIDEO Titles][MUSIC none]
[LABEL Эээ, братуха, постой! Ладно, вот сотка... и молчи!][VIDEO GopGives100rub][AUDIO {this.lang}/take_100_and_keep_silent]
[LABEL Ну как хочешь, Чекрыжу больше должен будешь...]
[LABEL ][FINAL Отрицательный финал... Гоп пырнул тебя ножом. Не рискуй так в реальной жизни.][VIDEO GopThrustKnife][AUDIO knife_blow]

[LABEL Щас на перо насажу, кровью кудахтать будешь, гнида!][VIDEO GopTreatenWithKnife][AUDIO {this.lang}/cut_you][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Ты чо, обурела, ветошь?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/vetosh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL ][FINAL Нейтральный финал. Гоп потерял к вам интерес и ушел, повезло...][VIDEO GopLostInterest]

[LABEL Ты чо не всосал? Просто молчи и всё!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/simply_no_talking][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Не говорить про то, как ты его лохом назвал?]

[LABEL Ваще ничо не говори.][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/nothing_say][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Ладно, иди куда шёл! Чекрыжу ничего не говори.][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/Nothing_say_Chekryzh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Да, мы с ним в одном классе учились.]
[LABEL ][FINAL Отрицательный финал... Гоп стукнул тебя в тыкву.][VIDEO GopPunchesToFace][AUDIO {this.lang}/Take_it_fool][SOUNDFX boom2]

[LABEL Ты запарил, никому я не звонил! Вали отсюда, пока люлей не отхватил!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/no_phone_to_Chekryzh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Сгинь отсюда я сказал!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/hide_away][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Слух, кароче, шкандыбай отсюда!][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/go_away][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Дай я сам с ним поговорю!]

[LABEL "Алло, Чекрыж, здарова! Тут один мутный кент бакланит, что тебя знает! Такой типа ботаник..."][VIDEO GopPhonesChekryzh][AUDIO {this.lang}/Hallo_Chekryzh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL ][FINAL Положительный финал! Ты отвлек внимание гопа и стукнул его в тыкву!][VIDEO GopBePunched][SOUNDFX boom]

[LABEL А в кармане чо лежит?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/what_in_packet][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Ладно, держи, только звони побыстрее!][VIDEO GopTakesMobile]
[LABEL ][FINAL Положительный финал! Ты только  что обманул гопа!][VIDEO GopLooksAside][AUDIO {this.lang}/Where_is_shit]
[LABEL Ладно, только сначала говно с рукава вытри.]

[LABEL Чо ты ссышь то? Жми 8... 9... ээээ.... забыл... кароче, дай сюда, я сам наберу!][VIDEO GopSpeechSimpleLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/give_me_i_phone_myself][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Ладно, только звони из моих рук.]

[LABEL Давай сюда, я свою симку вставлю.][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/give_mobila_my_SIM][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Я же дал тебе сотку, мне идти надо, я опаздываю!]
[LABEL Хорошо, вот тебе сотка, извини, я пошёл!][VIDEO GopTakes2x50rub]

[LABEL Слух, ты лошара проотвечался, бабло всё быстро выгреб сюда!][VIDEO GopTreatenWithKnife][AUDIO {this.lang}/money_give_to_me_faster][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Я имел ввиду он знает меня чисто визуально...]

[LABEL А чо мутишь, что знаешь? Гони сотку за гнилой базар!][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/lie_you_know_Chekryzh][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Если честно, то он меня видел, но мы не общались...]

[LABEL Я ведь щас отзвонюсь, проверю, на бабки попадёшь, если гонишь!][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/phone_check][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Чекрыжа? Этого лоха? Гыгыгы! А он то тебя знает?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/Chekryzh_knows_you][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL ][FINAL Отрицательный финал... Ну что, получил? Для гопов Вася = Лох!][VIDEO GopPunchesToFace][AUDIO {this.lang}/Take_it_fool][SOUNDFX boom2]
[LABEL Кого из пацанов знаешь?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/whom_knew][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Пирожки несёшь? Гыгыгы... Курить чо есть?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/carry_patties][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL А тебе не всё ли равно?]

[LABEL А тут чо шаришься?][VIDEO GopSpeechNibblesSunflowerSeeds][AUDIO {this.lang}/what_you_do_here][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]

[LABEL Слух, ты ваще с какого района?][VIDEO GopSpeechLoadingLoop][AUDIO {this.lang}/what_region][BGNDVIDEO GopEatsSunflowerSeedsLoop,GopDrinks,GopSmokes][TIMEEXPIRED gop_punchs_to_face][ANSWERTIME 30]
[LABEL Вобще я в тренажёрку хожу, качаюсь...]
